channel.title: Making An Object Donator Only Help

item.title: Making An Object Donator Only Help
item.dc:creator: @wanwan69 wanwan69
item.description:
@wanwan69 wrote:

case 410:
if(p.rights == 0) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “This altar is for donators only!”);
}
p.appendExperience(5000, 21);
p.clickDelay = 3;
p.requestAnim(791, 0);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 5000000);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You pray and get 5m”);
if(p.donator == 1);
break;

That is my code now, no errors, when you pray at it as a non donor, it says you must be donator to use this altar or w/e, but you still can use it, but i did fix the where you become donor after praying, but normal players can still prayer at it.

Read full topic
item.source: Making An Object Donator Only Help

item.title: Making An Object Donator Only Help
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

In your original code, all that did was MAKE them donator. So anyone on your server who used the altar basically got a free donator rank and cash because you dont understand the fundamentals of java. You need to add
if(p.donator == 1) {

before the code so it checks if they are a donator before allowing the code to continue. Odds are their accounts arent made donator at login, they just took advantage of your programming error.

Read full topic
item.source: Making An Object Donator Only Help

item.title: Making An Object Donator Only Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Change the public int Donator = 1;
to

public int Donator = 0;

or delete this.

item.title: Making An Object Donator Only Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“UniqueTrys, post:5, topic:412353”]Change ur code to this (mods admins and owners can use it too now)

case 410: if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("This altar is for donators only!"); return false; } p.appendExperience(5000, 21); p.clickDelay = 3; p.requestAnim(791, 0); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 5000000); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You pray and get 5m"); p.Donator = 1; break;

and u might want to change the clickdelay…[/quote]
… That’s for PI.

case 410: if(p.playerRights == 0) { p.getActionSend().sendMessage(p, "This altar is for donators only!"); return; } else if (p.playerRights > 1 ) { p.appendExperience(5000, 21); p.clickDelay = 3; p.requestAnim(791, 0); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 5000000); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You pray and get 5m"); p.Donator = 1; } break;

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I think you’d want to add something similar to this:

if(c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("This altar is for donators only!"); return false; }

p.clickDelay = 3;
p.requestAnim(791, 0);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 5000000);

break;
